scripts.test:coverage: nyc _mocha test/unit test/int && nyc report -r html && nyc check-coverage
scripts.release:test: set -uex; yarn test; npm version prerelease; npm publish --tag testing --access public
scripts.release:patch2: set -uex; rm -rf node_modules; yarn; yarn run test:coverage; npm version patch; git push; npm publish --access public; git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: set -uex; rm -rf node_modules; yarn; yarn run test:coverage; npm version patch; npm publish --access public;
